talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Those <clr:0000>ore deposits<clr:ffff> over there are chock
full of it.

Given the gouged-out terrain and all the
tools and structures we've found...<sp:5:0:0>I think
this place used to be a <clr:0000>mine<clr:ffff>.
talk_1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Well, fine!<sp:5:0:0> Because you're about to go
silent as a stone...FOREVER!
talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I mean, that's some pretty weird <clr:0000>ore<clr:ffff>,
right?<sp:5:0:0> I've never seen it on the surface.
talk_1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_01>Well, hello! Did they send you to
investigate this valley too?
talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's the same for the <clr:0000>other huge valleys<clr:ffff>
too.<sp:5:0:0> It's just a shame we have no idea
how to use this ore.
But you have no need to know, do you?


<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_00>Because right now,<sp:5:1:0> you're looking at the
Yiga who will take you down!
talk_1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The valley has evidence of civilization
everywhere.<sp:5:0:0> I have no doubt that it used
to be a mining area.
All the <clr:0000>other huge valleys<clr:ffff> are the same.
I wonder what value those <clr:0000>ore deposits<clr:ffff>
really hold...
talk_1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>Look, it's <clr:0000>full of weird ore deposits<clr:ffff>.


Between the gouged-out terrain and the
handmade objects, this must have been
a mine way back when.
talk_1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, <sp:5:0:0>it looks like you've got some on hand.
<sp:5:0:0>Guess you're no stranger to this stuff.<sp:0:4:0>I've never seen this ore on the surface
before, so it's all new to me.
talk_1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Same goes for those <clr:0000>other huge valleys<clr:ffff>.
Those <clr:0000>deposits<clr:ffff> must be worth <sp:5:0:0>something.

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>I just wish we knew what to do with the
ore that comes out of them...
talk_1000:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00>BWAH!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


D-d-<sp:5:0:0>don't surprise me like that!<sp:5:0:0> How
was I supposed to know you weren't a
Yiga Clan member or something?!
<sp:0:2:2:5000>Geez... Practically scared the pants off me.<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Ummm...<sp:5:0:0> So, <sp:5:0:0>are you also here to
investigate <clr:0000>the ore in these mineral
deposits<clr:ffff>?
talk_1001:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Uwaaah!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Y-y-<sp:5:0:0>you scared me!<sp:5:0:0> You could've been
a Yiga Clan member coming to take my
life, or worse yet, my ore!
<sp:0:2:2:5000>Geez... Give a guy a break already. Scary enough
just working down here.<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Ummm...<sp:5:0:0> So, <sp:5:0:0>are you also here to
investigate <clr:0000>the ore in these mineral
deposits<clr:ffff>?
talk_1030: <sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Ease>You have some nerve, trying to ignore me.
